programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son and the boozy misanthrope who lives next door.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: Traffik, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Ruth, a dedicated mother, begins to fear for her troubled teenage daughter.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Villeneuve Pironi: Racing's Untold Tragedy, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: The story of Canadian Formula 1 legend Gilles Villeneuve and French star Didier Pironi, two fearless Ferrari Formula 1 drivers, forever torn apart by a historic and hugely controversial moment in time.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Mass Ave, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: A racial profiling incident forever changes the relationship between a man and his son.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Cut Bank, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons, (2022, Animated)
programme.desc: On his birthday, Jonathan Kent learns his dad is Superman and that he has superpowers of his own. He also meets Damian Wayne. The two boys are forced to team up to protect their loved ones from a hostile alien force.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Knight and Day, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Lady Bird, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: The Iron Claw, (2023, Biography)
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: Warcraft, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A king (Dominic Cooper), a mighty warrior (Travis Fimmel) and a powerful wizard (Ben Foster) unite to defend the human realm of Azeroth from a tyrannical shaman (Daniel Wu) and his invading army of orcs.

programme.title: Denial, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Writer David Irving (Timothy Spall) wages a legal battle against historian Deborah Lipstadt (Rachel Weisz) after she accuses him of denying the Holocaust.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: A United Kingdom, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friend's widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singer's debut album.

programme.title: Where to Invade Next, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Michael Moore visits various countries, including France, Italy, Germany, Finland and Slovenia, to examine how Europeans view work, education, health care, sex, equality, and other issues.

programme.title: Challengers, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wife's former boyfriend.

programme.title: Atlantic City, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A boardwalk numbers runner (Burt Lancaster) feels young again with a casino clam shucker (Susan Sarandon) and a lucky cocaine deal.

programme.title: Dark Blue, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie policeman (Scott Speedman) objects when his hard-edged partner (Kurt Russell) conspires with his mentor (Brendan Gleeson) to pin murders on two ex-convicts.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Crimson Tide, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two U.S. Navy officers (Denzel Washington, Gene Hackman) clash aboard a nuclear submarine bound for Russia, while that country is under rebel siege.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acting CIA chief (Harrison Ford) learns the president has triggered a war with Colombian drug cartels.

programme.title: Apollo 13, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert try to return to Earth after an explosion aborts the April 1970 moonshot.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke bonds with the other Front Half residents and begins plotting his escape; Ms. Sigsby manages the fallout from a security breach; in town, Tim begins to look into The Institute, only to find himself caught up in a high-stakes standoff.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: A group of Allied soldiers are intent on breaking out, not only to escape, but also to draw Nazi forces away from battle to search for fugitives. Among the prisoners are American Captain Virgil Hilts and British Squadron Leader Roger Bartlett.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: U.S. lawyers (Anthony Hopkins, Matthew McConaughey) defend Africans who revolted against their Spanish captors aboard a slave ship in 1839.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: A police captain saves three young adults (Claire Danes, Giovanni Ribisi, Omar Epps) from jail, recruiting them to work under cover in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, War)
programme.desc: An imprisoned U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) fights the military overlord (Oh Soon-tek) of a slave-labor opium operation in Vietnam.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Considered a suspect in a deadly arson, a police chief must cover his tracks while trying to prove his innocence.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Novocaine, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Married to the Mob, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Matthew Modine) gets close to a gangster's widow (Michelle Pfeiffer) in order to nab a crime boss (Dean Stockwell).

programme.title: Danica
programme.desc: Racing superstar Danica Patrick reveals herself like never before: as a competitor preparing for her next race, a woman confidently considering when she wants to start a family and a budding mogul carefully considering thinking about her next steps.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween, (2016, Hallowe'en)
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service, (1969, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (George Lazenby) proposes to a contessa (Diana Rigg) and foils SPECTRE chief Blofeld's (Telly Savalas) agricultural plot.

programme.title: The Living Daylights, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond (Timothy Dalton) takes a Czech cellist (Maryam d'Abo) to her boyfriend, a KGB defector (Jeroen Krabb) doing business in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Octopussy, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) links a fake Faberge egg to smugglers (Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan) in league with a mad Soviet general.

programme.title: Live and Let Die, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) charms a tarot reader (Jane Seymour) in Jamaica on the voodoo/heroin trail of Mr. Big (Yaphet Kotto).

programme.title: From Russia With Love, (1963, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) lands in Istanbul with a Russian beauty (Daniela Bianchi), a pawn in SPECTRE's plot to kill him.

programme.title: GoldenEye, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A secret weapon's theft sends Agent 007 to Russia, where a pretty computer programmer helps him track an ex-cohort believed dead.

programme.title: Die Another Day, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: James Bond (Pierce Brosnan) teams with a beautiful agent (Halle Berry) to battle a terrorist and a businessman (Toby Stephens) bent on world domination.

programme.title: Dr. No, (1962, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: An erotic sleepover; the seduction of VR porn; rekindling one's sex life after a long illness.

programme.title: Jason's Lyric, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: A TV salesman falls for a spirited waitress and clashes with his wayward brother, as their lives reconnect in inner-city Houston.

programme.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing, (2022, Fantasy)
programme.desc: While attending a conference in Istanbul, Dr. Alithea Binnie happens to encounter a djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom. Eventually, she's beguiled and makes a wish that surprises them both.

programme.title: The Institute

programme.desc: Nikki leva uma vida confortvel, apenas seduzindo mulheres, at que um dia ele conhece uma garonete que tambm gosta de seduzir. Os dois passam a realizar um jogo de disputas at que chega a hora em que precisam decidir entre o amor e o dinheiro.

programme.title: Middleton, (2013, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: George e Edith no tem nada em comum, exceto pelo fato de que seus filhos podem estudar no mesmo local, a Universidade de Middlleton. Acompanhando os rebentos, eles escapam da tediosa excurso pelo campus e rapidamente estabelecem uma conexo especial.

programme.title: Os assassinatos continuam, e L comea a suspeitar do comportamento perfeito de Light que ento decide investigar por conta prpria.

programme.title: Um Ladro de Joias, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um ladro de sangue frio, Frank Stone, escreve contos de seus crimes para impressionar Jackie, uma jovem estudante de literatura. Quando Jackie assassinada, Frank jura eliminar todos que sejam responsveis por sua morte.

programme.title: Um Homem Contra Wall Street, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um homem perde todas as suas economias aps seguir um conselho e fazer um mau investimento. Mas quando o seguro de sade rejeita sua esposa doente, ele fica desesperado e vai atrs dos representantes do sistema financeiro em busca de vingana.

programme.title: Dupla Explosiva: Ecks vs. Sever, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ainda sofrendo com a morte da esposa, o ex-agente do FBI Jeremiah Ecks tem que voltar para o trabalho para caar um perigoso sequestrador, que tem em seu poder o filho do chefe de uma agncia internacional. Sua parceira ser uma agente que ele odeia.

programme.title: Inimigo em Casa, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Susan vai se casar com Rick Barnes, mas seu filho Danny no aprova. Escondido no carro de Rick, Danny testemunha um assassinato. Ningum, alm de seu pai, acredita nele devido ao seu histrico de mentiras. Ele inicia uma investigao prpria.

programme.title: Guerra nas Ruas, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O detetive Manny Rodriguez precisa solucionar uma onda de crimes entre gangues de rua e, para isso, deve identificar primeiro quais policiais esto ao seu lado e quais fazem parte da rede criminosa que domina a regio.

programme.title: American Sicario, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez planeja se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, mas acaba fazendo inimigos tanto entre poderosos cartis quanto entre seus aliados. Seu casamento com Gloria, que est grvida, se deteriora.

programme.title: Sentena de Morte, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Nick Hume est voltando para casa aps um jogo de hquei com seu filho Brendan e para para abastecer. Ele v um bandido matar Brendan. Ento vai atrs do assassino por conta prpria, desencadeando uma guerra com o irmo mais velho do dele.

programme.title: A Verdadeira Histria de Ned Kelly, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um olhar sobre o mito da vida de Ned Kelly, o maior fora-da-lei da histria da Austrlia, desde sua juventude at sua morte, observando o passado de violncia de toda uma sociedade, incluindo a lendria rebelio que planejou na dcada de 1870.

programme.title: Caador de Demnios, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O caador de demnios Jebediah Woodley viaja at uma pequena cidade ao sul do Mississippi na expectativa de enfrentar um demnio. Quando a entidade maligna acidentalmente libertada, ela comea a possuir e matar os moradores da regio.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Gaviota libertada e Diana se sente sozinha na priso, mas ela se oferece para pagar sua fiana.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperana, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Anglica uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de cncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez.

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: Minsculos - O Filme, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio aos restos de um piquenique, uma joaninha ajuda formigas negras em uma divertida batalha por acar contra formigas vermelhas.

programme.title: Minha Vida de Cachorro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos anos 1950, Ingemar enviado para parentes no interior da Sucia devido doena de sua me. Inicialmente com dificuldades de adaptao e saudades da famlia, ele acaba vivendo experincias marcantes para toda sua vida.

programme.title: Uma Paixo em Seoul, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Kim uma jovem filipina que vive com seus pais superprotetores. Quando descobre uma vaga para ensinar ingls a um empresrio em Seul, ela foge para uma vida nova. Ela s no espera viver um tringulo amoroso com seu aluno e o assistente dele.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um jovem delinquente do ensino mdio obrigado a ser o tutor de uma escola de baixa renda. L, ele se apaixona pela filha do pastor e vive uma paixo cheia de diferenas e surpresas.

programme.title: Terra dos Bravos, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O detetive Matthias Breecher contratado para rastrear o pior dos criminosos da guerra dos confederados. Enquanto percorre o Velho Oeste em busca de justia, sua determinao testada quando ele conhece uma pioneira que muito mais do que parece.

programme.title: Fora Maior, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Durante as frias nos Alpes Suos, uma famlia surpreendida por uma avalanche de neve que se aproxima. Desesperado, o pai, Toms, age impulsivamente e coloca em risco a segurana do seu casamento e tambm o relacionamento com seus filhos.

programme.title: Caf com Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Claire trabalha em um charmoso caf. Com palavras de sabedoria, ela ajuda e conforta diferentes tipos de clientes com seus conselhos sobre questes pessoais. Porm, um grande acontecimento est prestes a mudar a vida de todos os clientes do lugar.

programme.title: O Dono da Festa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Van Wilder ficou famoso na cidade por organizar as melhores festas da faculdade. Porm, o veterano forado a mudar sua rotina de sete anos aps perder a mesada do pai, deixando as festividades com os dias contados.

programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Rockers, (1978, Documentary)
programme.desc: Night Flight Presents: Starring Leroy 'Horsemouth' Wallace and Richard 'Dirty Harry' Hall; ROCKERS is a story of oppressed Jamaican musicians getting even with the 'mafia types' in the business

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!

programme.title: Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Stelly, Sabo's adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!

programme.title: Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!

programme.title: Vivi reunites with Dalton and Dr. Kureha from the Sakura Kingdom and they share their memories of the Straw Hats with Shirahoshi and Rebecca. Meanwhile, a shadowy figure descends a long staircase at the castle in the Holyland and opens a mysterious door.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!

programme.title: Shirahoshi crosses the fancy of a Celestial Dragon, and those living gods are not open to having their whims disobeyed! As she is dragged away, King Neptune comes to her rescue, risking life and limb by defying the Celestial Dragon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: The Emperors of the Sea, Big Mom and Kaido decide to team up against Luffy! Meanwhile, Garp hears about the wild exploits of his grandson, all while a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!

programme.title: After sneaking into the Land of the Gods, Sabo sees the shocking figure of his friend Kuma! Abused by the World Government as a pawn in their games, Kuma, who was made an example of what happens when you disobey the gods!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!

programme.title: The Reverie has begun! The representative kings and queens first discuss what to do with Straw Hat Luffy. Meanwhile the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma! All while they recount how the Straw Hats have grown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!

programme.title: In order to recruit a strong ally towards bringing down Kaido, Cat Viper and his crew stop by Whitebeard's homeland to see Marco, the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento!

programme.title: Luffy and the others become excited as they see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie while they close in on the Land of Wano. But this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious! The sea itself is a barrier!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!

programme.title: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!

programme.title: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!

programme.title: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre's group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!

programme.title: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!

programme.title: Otama's temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido's Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.title: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.title: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin'emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin'emon's ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!

programme.title: Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!

programme.title: Kin'emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke's mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!

programme.title: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!

programme.title: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".
programme.sub-title: The Girl in the Twin Towers

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.
programme.sub-title: The Killers Gather in the Wasteland

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.
programme.sub-title: Zenigata's Pride and the Desert Dust

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chlo's Bistro. Chlo is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendrio cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Dupla em Fria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigao cheia de emoo e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Operaes Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operaes especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a misso de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga priso. L, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres so reveladas, Steele percebe que eles esto presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueologo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o misterio de Ragnarok. Porem, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: RedBad: A Invaso dos Francos
programme.desc: As lutas pelo poder e as guerras entre o Redbad Frisiano e seu inimigo jurado Pepin de Herstal, Senhor dos Francos.

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacvel ex.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manh eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles tm a fazer pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Ento eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins comeam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Confisses de um Filho
programme.desc: Confisses de um filho prdigo uma verso moderna da histria do filho prdigo que Jesus contou.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma histria da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela filha do Rei.

programme.title: A Histria de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A Histria de Wim de A a Z) Esta a histria do rfo Wim, que quer muito ir escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando foradamente na fbrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma famlia amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanas
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o vero, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Vero Inesquecvel
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota m. medida que a competio esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Aps uma misso, uma enfermeira do exrcito retorna fazenda da sua av em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Meu Amigo P Grande
programme.desc: Depois de um acidente de bicicleta na floresta, Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, P Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura, que foi deslocada por um incndio recente na floresta. Mas quando dois valentes encontram o P Grande, eles decidem captur-lo e explor-lo comercialmente. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o P Grande e devolv-lo sua casa.

programme.title: Nada para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educao rgida, eles tambm desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, professor e est apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, h uma coisa que sempre os manter juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A Histria de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A Histria de Wim de A a Z) Esta a histria do rfo Wim, que quer muito ir escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando foradamente na fbrica da cidade. programme.desc: Aps uma misso, uma enfermeira do exrcito retorna fazenda da sua av em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Perseguido pelo Destino
programme.desc: Em um circuito de corridas, o gngster Gigi (Matthias Schoenaerts), membro de uma cruel gangue criminosa de Bruxelas, conhece a jovem e rica corredora Bibi (Adle Exarchopoulos). Logo, os dois se apaixonam, mas por causa de suas vidas distintas, a chance de ficarem juntos remota. Mesmo assim, eles iniciam um relacionamento pelo qual lutaro com unhas e dentes, mas que tambm colocar suas vidas em perigo.

programme.title: Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqestrada, que est agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda est viva. Em uma corrida terrvel contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e at mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistrio de seu desaparecimento e liberao do cativeiro

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu pais, uma pobre familia viaja em busca de melhores condicoes de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles sao atacados por uma gangue de crueis fora-da-lei, que so poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: O Mistrio Da Passagem Da Morte
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes norte-americanos viajam para Passagem de Dyatlov em busca de respostas sobre os eventos ocorridos na dcada de 1950, quando nove esquiadores russos morreram inexplicavelmente. Gravando um documentrio, eles percorrem a trilha amaldioada dos Montes Urais e logo comeam a desconfiar que no esto sozinhos no local.

programme.title: O Segredo da Floresta
programme.desc: Durante uma viagem romntica no interior da ndia, um casal de Los Angeles acidentalmente testemunha o exorcismo assustador de uma menina de 11 anos. Eles decidem resgat-la.

programme.title: O Exorcismo de Karen Walker
programme.desc: Um casal descobre um dispositivo Kirlian em sua nova casa. Intrigados com o conceito de fotografar a aura das pessoas, eles, sem saber, liberam um mal antigo.

programme.title: Depois da Escurido
programme.desc: Conforme o sol se apaga, uma famlia se rene para enfrentar o fim do mundo, suas esperanas de resgate lentamente diminuem enquanto enfrentam conflitos entre si.

programme.title: Histria de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera (Sienna Miller), uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemtico (Nick Matthews) entrar em seu apartamento. As coisas se complicam quando ele decide atac-la

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) est com vrios problemas em sua vida. O prdio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano est sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dvida. O escolhido Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat v at seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Fuga

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixo s crianas e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele no tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: No Rastro da Violncia
programme.desc: Fascinada pelas razes do comportamento violento, a psicloga renomada Dra. Amanda Tyler tem a oportunidade de entrevistar e analisar Jackson Shea, prisioneiro do corredor da morte.

programme.title: Profisso de Risco
programme.desc: Jack contratado por Dragna, um chefo do crime, para realizar uma tarefa aparentemente inocente: ele deve levar uma mala para um motel em Nova Orleans e esperar que ela seja recolhida. Mas Jack nunca conseguir abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida est em risco. Vrios criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defend-la se quiser viver.
